# Survey of Income and Program Participation (SIPP)

## Organization
US Census Bureau

## Website
https://www.census.gov/sipp/

## Description
*	Longitudinal survey 
*	Captures income dynamics and program participation of US individuals and households 
*	Used to evaluate use of and eligibility for government programs

## Vintage/Release Frequency
Annual since 1984

## Observational Unit
Household, person, mortgage, or home improvement project (4 relational databases or one flat file)

## Collection Methodology
*	Nationally-representative continuous series of panels from 2.5 to 4 years duration per panel 
*	Multi-stage, stratified sample of US civilian non-institutionalized population

## Available at
https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/sipp/data/datasets.html

## User Guide/Data Dictionary
* An online codebook is available at: https://www.census.gov/data-tools/demo/uccb/sippdict.
* A desription of the methodology can be found at https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/sipp/methodology.html.

## Cost
Free for download

No
